title: Inquiry-Based Science Education Material Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and elementary educational environments
context.additional_context: For pre-service social studies teachers and education-related job seekers, a course strengthening the capacity to develop inquiry-based science education materials applicable even in resource-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply an inquiry-based science activity design framework considering actual elementary education environments.
Learners can evaluate the educational value of low-cost DIY science kits and propose improvement strategies.
Learners can measure the effectiveness of instructional materials using formative assessment tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
